bug.short_desc: qx.Mobile Checkbox should have a red border if validated false

long_desc.thetext:
When validating a form, a checkbox widget does not get a red border if it does not match the validation rules.
See:
http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/playground/#%7B%22code%22%3A%22var%2520page%2520%253D%2520new%2520qx.ui.mobile.page.NavigationPage()%253B%250Apage.setTitle(%2522Hello%2520World%2522)%253B%250Apage.addListener(%2522initialize%2522%252C%2520function()%2520%257B%250A%2520%2520%250A%2520%2520%250A%2520%2520var%2520form%2520%253D%2520new%2520qx.ui.mobile.form.Form()%253B%250A%2520%2520var%2520check%2520%253D%2520new%2520qx.ui.mobile.form.CheckBox().set(%257B%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520required%253A%2520true%250A%2520%2520%257D)%253B%250A%2520%2520form.add(check%252C%2520%2522check%2522)%253B%250A%2520%2520%250A%2520%2520page.getContent().add(new%2520qx.ui.mobile.form.renderer.Single(form))%253B%250A%2520%2520%250A%2520%2520form.validate()%253B%250A%2520%2520%250A%2520%2520%250A%257D%252Cthis)%253B%250A%250Athis.getManager().addDetail(page)%253B%250A%250Apage.show()%253B%22%2C%20%22mode%22%3A%22mobile%22%7D
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
